name: athena
description: ATHENA (AI Tool for Human-centered ENhanced coding Assistance) is a VS Code extension for code completion using LLMs.

athena.displayMode.description: Choose how code suggestions are displayed.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Inline: Show code suggestions inline, next to your code.
Tooltip: Show code suggestions in a popup window near your cursor.
Side Window: Show code suggestions in a minimal side window.
Chatbot: Show code suggestions within an interactive chatbot in a side window.
Hybrid: Choose how to show code suggestions depending on their length.

athena.hybridModeShortSuggestions.description: Only works when Display Mode is set to 'hybrid' - Choose how to display short code suggestions.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Inline: Show short code suggestions inline, next to your code.
Tooltip: Show short code suggestions in a popup window near your cursor.

athena.hybridModeLongSuggestions.description: Only works when Display Mode is set to 'hybrid' - Choose how to display long code suggestions.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Side Window: Show long code suggestions in a minimal side window.
Chatbot: Show long code suggestions within an interactive chatbot in a side window.

athena.triggerMode.description: Choose how code suggestions are triggered.

athena.suggestionGranularity.description: Adjust the granularity of code suggestions (min. 1, max. 5).

athena.openaiAPIKey.description: Set the OpenAI API key to use GPT-4o-mini model.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
